name: Howl-o-ween Paw-ty
description:
The dog's are having a spooky halloween paw-ty, but all manner of monsters are turning up uninvited to crash it!

- Protect the dogs from the monsters -
- Click the monsters to destroy them -
- Don't click the friendly dogs! -
- Don't let the monsters ruin the dog's paw-ty! -

Created for Spooky 2D Jam 2021. Design & Code by Theo, Art by Chloe, Music by Cristobal. Game made in Unity, art in Photoshop, and music in Logic Pro X. The sound effects are from various royalty-free sources. Play in your browser, or download on PC. 

Thanks for playing!
